review.title: “Hectic and frustrating”
review.pros: Pros – Business model potential, Scalability of the business model, Application of the business model accross industries and customer types, The late 2010 purchase by SME, Leadership and restructuring by SME, SME Capabilities, tructure and Resources
review.cons: Cons – Lack of direction and alignment, Use of "instinct" rather than data and facts in decision making, not staying with decisions/plans long enough to generate valid results, Favorable treatment of "favored" employees despite business results, Development and maintenance of elaborate systems to create success for certain employees despite the negative impact on customers, other employees, moral etc.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Mimize the number of strategic initiatives, Begin with specific long term Strategic Objectives in mind and work backwards, Create Structures and Systems designed to create the selected Strategic Objectives, Create Job Descriptions and hire people based on skills required, use data and metrics to evaluate results, reward accordingly, allow sufficient time to create meaningful results
